note.p: Birth: Trenick House, near Truro, Cornwall, England (16 March 1819)
Death: The Rock, South Brent, Devon (29 July 1889)
Career: Practised as a dentist first with his father in Truro, then in Swansea, then Plymouth (from 1851); an authority on crustacea

Memberships: FLS (1854); Honorary Member, Dublin Natural History Society; Corresponding Member, Zoological and Botanical Association of Trinity College, Dublin; MRCS (1860); Odontological Society (President)
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1889 vol 46 pp xli-xlii signed by G S B
